name: END OF THE WORLD - NTR
description:
The end of the world with zombie, two people no change to zombie.
They rely on sneaking to obtain food.
The female character had boy friend.
She missed her boyfriend and was very lonely.
You survival with her, let her feel good with you and clear her boyfriend without her knowledge.
Then got her! sex with her! let her addicted to sex!

This is a stealth game.
Avoid the corpses and obtain items by sneaking.
Increase the value to make sneaking easier.
obtain items to unlock skins, photo galleries and sex pose.
